applicationName.label: Application Name
applicationName.tooltip: The display name or label for your app, seen by users of the app in the LaunchPad UI.

validation.minLength: Application name must be at least 2 characters
validation.pattern: Application name must contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, and hyphens

description.label: Description
description.tooltip: The app description, seen by users of the app in the LaunchPad UI.

defaultRole.label: Assign a Default Role
defaultRole.tooltip: Unauthenticated or guest users of the app will have this role.

apiKey.label: The API key for this app is

appLocation.label: App Location
appLocation.tooltip: Select File Storage if you want to store your app code on your DreamFactory instance or some other remote file storage. Select Native for native apps or running the app from code on your local machine (CORS required). Select URL to specify a URL for your app.

options.noStorage: No Storage Required - remote device, client, or desktop.

fileStorage.label: On a provisioned file storage service.

storageService.label: Storage Service
storageService.tooltip: Where to store the files for your app.

storageFolder.label: Storage Folder
storageFolder.tooltip: The folder on the selected storage service.

validation.pattern: Storage folder must be a valid path

launchPath.label: Launch Path
launchPath.tooltip: The is the file to load when your app is run. Default is index.html.
launchPath.placeholder: Enter default path and file to launch.

validation.pattern: Launch path must be a valid file path

pathToApp.label: Path to Application
pathToApp.tooltip: The is the file to load when your app is run. Default is index.html.

validation.pattern: Application path must be a valid file path

url.label: URL to Application
url.tooltip: Applications can consist of only a URL. This could be an app on some other server or a web site URL.

validation.pattern: URL must start with http:// or https://

urlPath.label: The URL for this app is:

validation.required: Please select an app location type

general.invalidForm: Please correct the errors below before submitting
general.networkError: Network error occurred. Please try again.
general.serverError: Server error occurred. Please contact support if the problem persists.

importApp.title: Import Application
importApp.subtitle: Select App Package File
importApp.description: Select one of the sample apps below, enter the URL for a package file, or browse for a local package file. Click 'Import' to add the app to your DreamFactory instance.

validation.pattern: URL must point to a valid package file

validation.fileRequired: Please select a file or enter a URL
validation.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a valid package file.
validation.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds maximum limit of 10MB
validation.uploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address

warning.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes that will be lost
warning.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this application?
warning.apiKeyRefresh: Refreshing the API key will invalidate the current key

info.selectFile: Please select a file to import
